alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 11:09AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson and southern Hardin Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1109 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fannett to near Hamshire. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Lumberton, Sour Lake, Nome, Hamshire, Bevil Oaks, China and Fannett. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 848 and 832. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
